DOC.brief_summary: To determine effect ambient PM2.5 exposures `` low level '' Southeastern Michigan `` high level '' beijing lipid metabolism among healthy adult without CV disease .
DOC.criteria: without CV disease risk factor ( e.g. , hypertension , diabetes , treat hyperlipidemia ) . Subjects nonsmoker nonsmoking household . Screening visit BP > 140/90 mm Hg , fast glucose > 126 mg/dL , positive urine pregnancy test ( female ) . Subjects take medication overthecounter drug affect CV function .
